name: Nyarlathotep (Faceless Sphinx)
content:
Nyarlathotep

Black Pharaoh, Faceless Sphinx, and Haunter of the Dark

Source Pathfinder #65: Into the Nightmare Rift pg. 41
Pathfinder Wiki Nyarlathotep

Details

Alignment CE
Pantheon Outer Gods
Areas of Concern Conspiracies, dangerous secrets, forbidden magic
Domains (Black Pharaoh) Chaos, Evil, Knowledge, Magic, Trickery
Domains (Haunter of the Dark) Chaos, Darkness, Evil, Knowledge, Magic
Domains (Faceless Sphinx) Air, Chaos, Evil, Knowledge, Magic
Favored Weapon Quarterstaff (Black Pharaoh), Dagger (Haunter of the Dark), Punching dagger (Faceless Sphinx)
Symbol Inverted ankh (Black Pharaoh), Circle with winglike arms (Haunter of the Dark), Image of a featureless face (Faceless Sphinx)
Sacred Animal(s) Panther (Black Pharaoh), Bat (Haunter of the Dark), N/A (Faceless Sphinx)
Sacred Color(s) Black, red (Black Pharaoh), Black, gold (Haunter of the Dark), N/A (Faceless Sphinx)

For Followers of Nyarlathotep

Feats

Dreamed Secrets

Traits

Unspeakable Bond
